attributes.action: Make Queen's "We Are The Champions" the UK National Anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Nothing against Her Majesty, but I just feel God Save the Queen is not an uplifting song. Queen are the biggest selling rock group of all time. We Are The Champions is sung at sporting events around the world. I feel this would be a fitting tribute to the greatest rock group of all time.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
